import {useRef} from 'react' import styles from "./Checkout.module.css" const Checkout = (props) => { //useRef to validate form inputs after submit const nameInputRef = useRef() const streetInputRef = useRef() const postalInputRef = useRef() const cityInputRef = useRef() //helper funcs, validation rules const isEmpty = value => value.trim() === '' const isNotFiveChars = value => value.trim().length !== 5 const confirmHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault() //read what user have entered when the form is submitted const enteredName = nameInputRef.current.value const enteredStreet = streetInputRef.current.value const enteredPostal = postalInputRef.current.value const enteredCity = cityInputRef.current.value } return (
) } export default Checkout
